Articles.Content:
Everytime I launch a vehicle with deployable science containers, they end up just having a control unit and two empty slots in each box. 

I'm on xbox

You should post questions that are concerning bugs in Technical Support and not in Gameplay Questions. You can ask a moderator to move the post (only moderators can do that) by pressing "report post". (Report post basically means "Could please a moderator have a look at this?")
Moving to Technical Support.
